findings.title: Possible rewards lost or receiving more
findings.description: Changing allocPoint in MasterBlid.set method while _withUpdate flag is set to false may lead to rewards lost or receiving rewards more than deserved.

findings.title: Privileged ownership
findings.description: The owner of the MasterBlid contract has permission to updateMultiplier, add new pools, change poolâ€™s allocation points, and set a migrator contract without community consensus.

findings.title: Excess writing operation
findings.description: When _allocPoint is not changed for the pool, there is still an assignment for a new value, which consumes gas doing nothing.

findings.title: Missing Emit Events
findings.description: Functions that change critical values should emit events for better off-chain tracking.
findings.location: Contract: MasterChef.sol, Functions: setMigrator, updateMultiplier, setBlidPerBlock

findings.title: Floating solidity version
findings.description: It is recommended to specify the exact solidity version in the contracts.

findings.title: Balance updated after transfer
findings.description: It is recommended to update the balance state before doing any token transfer.

findings.title: A public function that could be declared external
findings.description: Public functions that are never called by the contract should be declared external.
findings.location: Contracts: MasterChef.sol, Functions: updateMultiplier, add, set, setBlidPerBlock, setMigrator, setExpenseAddress, migrate, deposit, withdraw, enterStaking, leaveStaking
